comments.body: Note: moving the package spec to the top, so that all other specs can access the stored DAML-LF packages for the retrofitting of types.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@    with JdbcLedgerDaoSuite
    with JdbcLedgerDaoBackendH2Database
    with JdbcLedgerDaoPackagesSpec
    with JdbcLedgerDaoActiveContractsSpec
    with JdbcLedgerDaoCompletionsSpec
